entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
